item.description:
Blues and Jazz Music Festival - Worcester, MA - Sat.- June 25th

Copy and paste into browser---   http://baevents.com/pauliesnolabluesandjazzfestival/
 
Cost is $20 beforehand, $22 at the door.  FYI - this may sell out??????? 

I am going to the music festival on Sat. - definitely going to the Sat night Lindell Band from 5-7 pm- come find me to dance.  If you want to meet before hand send me an e-mail to work out the details.
item.how_to_find_us: we can meet somewhere before hand, or find me at the Lindell Band from 5-7 pm
item.name: Blues and Jazz Music Festival - Worcester, MA - Sat.- June 25th
